headline.main: NEW-YORK CITY.; GERMANS IN AMERICA. The Pic-Nic of the Snengverein at Elm Park. 30,000 PEOPLE ASSEMBLED. The Saengvereins. NEW-YORK UNIVERSITY. Wreck of the Challenge. EDUCATIONAL.

docs.lead_paragraph: In this City, on Tuesday, June 26, LOUISA C., wife of Robert Billsborron. The friends of the family are invited to attend the funeral, on Thursday, 28th inst., at 3 o'clock P.M., from her late residence, No. 274 Madison-st. In this City, on Friday, June 27, MICHAEL MULLEN. at Ohatham-st, aged 26 years. The remains were interred in the Cemetery of the Evergreens.

headline.main: A WEEK IN THE WILDERNESS.; SECOND LETTER.. Incidents and Observations on Raquette Lake--The Route to the Adirondack Iron Works.

docs.lead_paragraph: My last letter closed with the arrival of our party at the Raquette Lake. We were then very nearly in the centre of the Great Wilderness--being twenty-seven miles west of ROOT's, where we had left the Hudson River, and eighty-eight from Saratoga by the route we had followed, which was very nearly that of the projected railroad. the first

headline.main: DR. HUNTER ON INHALATION.; Letter No. XVIII. THE REFRACTORY DOCTORS. The Vain-The Prejudiced - and the Ignorant. An Enger Disciple with Enterprising Aspirations. Old Burton's Philosophy Tritely Applied. "Imitators," "New Systems," and "Improvements" in Inhilation. ELIAN'S VIEWS ON THIS SUBJECT.

docs.lead_paragraph: Interesting Dialogue between Dr. P. and his Patient--Damaged Goods Profitably Disposed of--Quackery in Inhalation--Advice to Country Patients--Mistaken Philanthropy--Murderous Kindness--Procrastination the Bane of Life--How are Chronic Diseases Cured?--Importance of Early Treatment--Country Air and Fashionable Resorts--The Proper Time for Treatment.

headline.main: NOTICES OF NEW BOOKS.; A Batch of Novels.

docs.lead_paragraph: We must clear our table of a heap of novels and romances which cover it, and the better way of doing this is to dispose of them en masse--briefly indicating our opinion of them respectively.

docs.lead_paragraph: The Martyr's Monument Association of Brooklya. This Society has already by subscriptions and moneys collected, secured a sufficient sum to construct the vault for the bones of the Martyrs, and to erect the base of the proposed Monument.

headline.main: IMPORTANT TESTIMONY; In favor of Inhalation in Diseases of the Lungs, Letters from Physicians in every Part of the Union. THE JOINT-STOCK MEDICAL COLLEGES. The Woman's Hospital, and a Word of Counsel to Dr. Sims.

docs.lead_paragraph: The Old Fogy School; the Best of its Time, but its Time is Past!--Physicians Guilty of Ungentleman-like Practices Dissected--The Tribe of Imitators--Old Burton's Philosophy Applied--Change of Climate and Fashionable Resorts--Cruel Practice! Caustic Solutions Pumped into the Lungs--Necessity for Remodeling the Treatment of Cholera and Other Infectious Diseases.

docs.lead_paragraph: To the Editor of the New-York Daily Times : It may not be inappropriate to revert to some facts which deserve a more serious attention than has hitherto been paid to them, either by the public or the authorities. I allude to the taking opium, recently exposed by the Press.
